doc:
Michael Bilton https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Michael_Bilton 0 Michael Bilton (14 December 1919 – 5 November 1993) was an English actor best known for his roles in the British television sitcoms To the Manor Born (playing the gardener and sometime butler Ned) and Waiting for God (playing Basil, a septuagenarian satyr). Michael_Bilton ( 14_December_1919 – 5_November_1993 ) was an_English_actor best_known for his_roles in the_British_television_sitcoms To the_Manor_Born ( playing the_gardener and sometime butler_Ned ) and Waiting for God ( playing_Basil , a_septuagenarian_satyr ) .
